info.title: Azure Media Services

get.description: List Account Filters in the Media Services account.

parameters.description: The unique identifier for a Microsoft Azure subscription.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.description: The name of the resource group within the Azure subscription.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.description: The Media Services account name.
parameters.name: accountName

parameters.description: The Version of the API to be used with the client request.
parameters.name: api-version

@odata.nextLink.description: A link to the next page of the collection (when the collection contains too many results to return in one response).

allOf.description: The core properties of ARM resources.

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource.

allOf.description: The resource model definition for a ARM proxy resource.

items.description: An Account Filter.

forceEndTimestamp.description: The indicator of forcing exsiting of end time stamp.

liveBackoffDuration.description: The relative to end right edge.

presentationWindowDuration.description: The relative to end sliding window.

timescale.description: The time scale of time stamps.

items.description: Representing a list of FilterTrackPropertyConditions to select a track.  The filters are combined using a logical AND operation.
The class to specify one track property condition.
